name: Escape from Nothing 2
description:
Escape from Nothing 2, earn points, reach the goal!

Escape from Nothing 2 is a simulator of a person who thinks that "Someone" is chasing her, but this "Someone" does not exist.

And Game is in 3D!

Compete with others in the ranking and become the TOP 1 ESCAPER in Escape from Nothing!

Game is 110% better than First Version!

Donate PLS
